title: PlainBudget – Minimalist Plain Text Budgeting
summary:
PlainBudget – Minimalist Plain Text Budgeting

PlainBudget is a minimalist budgeting tool that uses plain text files to track expenses and savings. The tool allows users to set a budget for each month and track their spending against that budget. However, some users have suggested improvements, such as the ability to import transactions and track savings over time. The tool is open source and has a command-line interface (CLI) that can be used to process plain text files.
